physical_appearance:This is a long piece of cloth used as a turban. It features a horizontal striped design
 with diamond scrolls presented in multiple colours. The ends of the cloth on the right are left unhemmed and frayed. The left end of the cloth is laid out
 while the rest of the length of the fabric is collected on the right.

 used by the Meghwal
 Ahir or Rabari communities of Gujarat and Rajasthan
